summary:
The Hammerfell Exoticist ensemble is what you might call a dancer\'s regalia, the skin showing kind oh so useful for distraction and mesmerizing. Developed for the Favored Soul & Sundracon bodies.
-Male Only-
descriptionHtml:
[font=palatino linotype][i][color=maroon][size=28][b]Hammerfell Exoticist[/size][/b][/color][/i][/font]

A fun and very skimpy outfit, while not exactly lore-friendly to Skyrim, you could potentially argue it as originating from Hammerfell and exclusive courts.

I didn\'t start off with a bellydancer in mind but it certainly went in that direction after a while. Can be crafted at blacksmith forges with a simple recipe, there is a \'cloth\' and a \'light armor\' variant in case you intend on doing some swashbuckling while flashing skin ;) Also, the light armor version can be tempered.

[color=orange]<><> Can be found at the forge under \'Misc\' <><>[/color]

NOTE: This is an original and standalone mod purely for fun. Not entirely lore-friendly. Be sure to verify the data files from your Skyrim Launcher & doublecheck that the mod is loaded.

*This mod is integrated with the Favored Soul & Sundracon body types, so, problems likely to occur if you do not have the corresponding mod installed. There are minor vertex weighting issues but mostly obscured.

<><><> Revision History <><><>
FS 1.0 - Original set.
FS 1.1 - World item updated to display properly in the character/forge menus and to appear & fall to the ground when dropped from the inventory.
Sund 1.0 - Set converted to Sundracon Body.

[color=gray]CREDITS:
Chris57 & Favored Soul\'s male body mesh
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2488

Male char in screenshot is a variant of Urshi\'s companion mod Hot Male Housecarls
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17163

Hair is from ApachiiSkyHair (also included in the Hot Male Housecarls mod)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168[/color]
author: Av1dPup1l
